name: Contestant
description:
In a future version of our world, there is a popular game series where a "Contestant" participates in shooting menacing robots and reaching the end of the level. You are a pizza delivery guy who decides to join the game series in hopes for fame and fortune. In Contestant "We Dare You!"

Levels: 30

Controls:

WASD = Moving

Mouse = Look Around

LeftClick = Shoot

T = Restart

ESC = Pause

O = Quit

If anyone has any problems with the game, feel free to contact henrywoodaqp@gmail.com in order to address these issues right away. Thank You!

WARNING:

The game has no continue function, if you quit the game, once you come back, you start  from scratch so be careful.
